column4: Outbound Winchester Rd between Delaware Ave and Detroit Ave
column5: Both lanes are blocked until further notice due to gas main repairs.  Traffic is being diverted to the center turn lane.

column4: Trent Blvd between River Park Dr and Niagara Dr
column5: The roadway is shut down in both directions due to a structure fire.

column4: New signals on Man O War Blvd at Blackford Pkwy currently in flash mode.
Full activation scheduled for Friday 5/3 at 10 a.m.
